Question1.text: mandatory|data|How satisfied or dissatisfied were you with your use of NZ Police online reporting service?
Question1.choices: mandatory|list|Very satisfied~Satisfied~Neither satisfied nor dissatisfied~Dissatisfied~Strongly dissatisfied

Question2.text: mandatory|data|How likely or unlikely are you to use the NZ Police online reporting should you need to report an incident to NZ Police in the future?
Question2.choices: mandatory|list|Very likely~Likely~Neither likely nor unlikely~Unlikely~Very unlikely

Question3.text: mandatory|data|How likely or unlikely are you to recommend a friend or family member use NZ Police Online Reporting to report an incident to NZ Police?
Question3.choices: mandatory|list|Very Likely~Likely~Neither likely nor unlikely~Unlikely~Very unlikely
